artist: Jack Larsen; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: 3/8" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Black warp..25" strips of twisted, orange metal foil strips and .3/8-.50" strips of orange, olive & rust leather separated with metallic silver-wrapped threads form weft. Stapled to  8.5 x11" card.  "H-3" printed on card. (black, orange, rust, olive)
title: Leather Cloth
